subject: Add missing BuildRequires
commitMessage:
Add missing BuildRequires

Fixes following errors:
/usr/lib/rpm/find-provides.ksyms: line 32: /usr/sbin/modinfo: No such
file or directory
error: Couldn't exec /usr/lib/rpm/find-requires.ksyms: No such file or
directory
/usr/lib/rpm/find-supplements.ksyms: line 70: /sbin/modinfo: No such
file or directory
ERROR: add module-init-tools to BuildRequires

Change-Id: I5ba6aada2a03d70c1906530a483983d5d3af43f1
Signed-off-by: Maciej Wereski <m.wereski@partner.samsung.com>

comments.message: Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: Revert "catch up with final working version of cgroups string interface"
commitMessage:
Revert "catch up with final working version of cgroups string interface"

This reverts commit 27940fdc7769131c6d18c7fd2d1e8f61cf952fd0.

Required for pre-3.11 compatibility.

Change-Id: I90a0b7966535aa4d0d48687d88da4febd0d86634
Signed-off-by: Karol Lewandowski <k.lewandowsk@samsung.com>

comments.message: Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: Bring task_cgroup_path_from_hierarchy() back for pre-3.11 compatiblity
commitMessage:
Bring task_cgroup_path_from_hierarchy() back for pre-3.11 compatiblity

This commit partially reverts ea2b8c798cd34149fa13010d24 ("message.c:
task_cgroup_path_from_hierarchy is now in 3.11-rc1, so remove it from
here").

We still require it for pre-3.11 kernels that Tizen is shipping.

Change-Id: I05568c5d8d473bb5257d3aa64f8a84b03e6da117
Signed-off-by: Karol Lewandowski <k.lewandowsk@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified-1 Code-Review-1

Fails to compile:

/home/TASK_4/tizenorg/kdbus-bus/message.c:449:5: warning: "LINUX_VERSION_CODE" is not defined [-Wundef]
/home/TASK_4/tizenorg/kdbus-bus/message.c:449:26: warning: "KERNEL_VERSION" is not defined [-Wundef]
/home/TASK_4/tizenorg/kdbus-bus/message.c:449:40: error: missing binary operator before token "("
/home/TASK_4/tizenorg/kdbus-bus/message.c: In function ‘kdbus_kmsg_append_meta’:
/home/TASK_4/tizenorg/kdbus-bus/message.c:630:3: error: implicit declaration of function ‘task_cgroup_path’ [-Werror=implicit-function-declaration]
cc1: some warnings being treated as errors

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

for macros LINUX_VERSION_CODE and KERNEL_VERSION, you need to include <linux/version.h>

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

if it compiles, +1
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
